org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.balancer

Class Dispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.balancer.Dispatcher

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class Dispatcher
extends Object
    Dispatching block replica moves between datanodes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Dispatcher.DBlock
      A class for keeping track of block locations in the dispatcher.

      This class keeps track of a scheduled block move

      A node that can be the sources of a block move

      • dispatchBlockMoves

        private long dispatchBlockMoves()
                         throws InterruptedException
        Dispatch block moves for each source. The thread selects blocks to move & sends request to proxy source to initiate block move. The process is flow controlled. Block selection is blocked if there are too many un-confirmed block moves.
        Returns:
        the total number of bytes successfully moved in this iteration.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • waitForMoveCompletion

        public static boolean waitForMoveCompletion(Iterable<? extends Dispatcher.DDatanode.StorageGroup> targets)
        Wait for all block move confirmations.
        Returns:
        true if there is failed move execution

      • isGoodBlockCandidate

        private boolean isGoodBlockCandidate(Dispatcher.DDatanode.StorageGroup source,
                           Dispatcher.DDatanode.StorageGroup target,
                           org.apache.hadoop.fs.StorageType targetStorageType,
                           Dispatcher.DBlock block)
        Decide if the block is a good candidate to be moved from source to target. A block is a good candidate if 1. the block is not in the process of being moved/has not been moved; 2. the block does not have a replica on the target; 3. doing the move does not reduce the number of racks that the block has

      • reduceNumOfRacks

        private boolean reduceNumOfRacks(Dispatcher.DDatanode.StorageGroup source,
                       Dispatcher.DDatanode.StorageGroup target,
                       Dispatcher.DBlock block)
        Determine whether moving the given block replica from source to target would reduce the number of racks of the block replicas.

      • isOnSameNodeGroupWithReplicas

        private boolean isOnSameNodeGroupWithReplicas(Dispatcher.DDatanode.StorageGroup source,
                                    Dispatcher.DDatanode.StorageGroup target,
                                    Dispatcher.DBlock block)
        Check if there are any replica (other than source) on the same node group with target. If true, then target is not a good candidate for placing specific replica as we don't want 2 replicas under the same nodegroup.
        Returns:
        true if there are any replica (other than source) on the same node group with target
